about_us: Personalized 360 Spatial Sound for Gaming provides precise rival detection2,3
Game for hours in comfort with soft headband and smooth ear pads
Discord certified, clear communications via a flexible flip-up boom microphone with mute function
Ergonomically designed controls for effortless operation
Personalize your experience through the INZONE Hub software2
Elevate gaming experience with INZONE gaming monitors1

All features: Designed with the environment in mind

Sony is committed not only to offering products, services and content that deliver exciting experiences but also to working towards our goal of a zero environmental footprint throughout our business activities.
When you want to use the microphone, fold it down and adjust it so it’s close to your mouth. Highly flexible, it can be angled into any position.
At the end of your gaming session, the microphone can be muted and stored away in one easy operation simply by flipping it up.
When you want to use the microphone, fold it down and adjust it so it’s close to your mouth. Highly flexible, it can be angled into any position.
At the end of your gaming session, the microphone can be muted and stored away in one easy operation simply by flipping it up.
Be the first to react with precise targe: Hear them before they see you. With 360 Spatial Sound for Gaming and our proven hardware technology, you can detect where your opponents are and how far away.1,2 Even players hiding in shadows, or behind walls and obstacles, can’t stay hidden for long.
Discover 360 Spatial Sound for gaming: Our 360 Spatial Sound for Gaming, activated by the PC software INZONE Hub1,2, features a newly developed virtualizer for gaming that reproduces spatial sound out of multi-channel audio signals as the game creators intended. Also, with the smartphone app 360 Spatial Sound Personalizer, you’ll get spatial sound optimized to your ear shape for truly personalized gameplay.3Product shown in video below is INZONE H9.
Advanced technology optimizes acoustics: We’ve designed our INZONE H3 headset to bring your game soundtrack to life. A symmetric acoustic structure, flexible enough to comfortably fit a variety of individual head shapes and sizes, enhances sound quality and spatial acoustic precision.
Powerful bass frequencies: Ducts on the housing of the INZONE H3 control and optimize low frequency sound reproduction for powerful bass that makes deep sounds like explosions and engines seem incredibly real. Hear the drama and intensity of your gaming world all around you.
Game for hours in comfort: We’ve created the INZONE H3 to be ultra comfortable so you can keep on playing through extended sessions. Designed to be secure and stable when worn, with minimal side pressure, this is a headset that’s ready to take into action for hours on end.
Cushions your head perfectly: The wide, soft headband cushion distributes weight evenly across your head for long-term wearing comfort.
Fits snugly around your ears: Smooth nylon ear pads are shaped to minimize pressure on your ears by optimizing contact with the side of your head. This extremely comfortable earpad material is designed for stability and sound insulation.
Lead your team to victory with clear com: Coordinate missions clearly and decisively. A flexible flip-up boom microphone with mute function allows you to communicate effortlessly in-game with squad members.
Boom microphone, voice-focused: The high sound quality boom microphone, shaped so it can be brought closer to your mouth, ensures you’ll always be heard clearly. This unidirectional microphone enables clear voice chat - even during the most frenetic moments of a game.
Discord Certified: Rest assured your headset works well on the Discord voice, video and text communication service for seamless voice chat with friends while playing games online.
Simple oval design for effortless operat: Our INZONE H3 features ergonomically designed control buttons and dials so you can easily change functions and adjust settings during a game. The volume dial has a protruding design for easy operation and the cable joints are highly durable for worry-free gaming.
Left side controls: On the left earcup are the main operation features and controls including the volume dial and boom microphone. All easily accessible while you are playing a game.
Personalize your gameplay: Our INZONE Hub PC software allows you to personalize your INZONE H3 experience by customizing a wide range of operations, including a variety of sound and hardware settings. Fine tune sound frequencies to your game for more clarity and immersion using the EQ function.1,2
Sharpen your senses with INZONE gaming m: Our INZONE monitors elevate your gaming experience and help you perform to the very best of your ability.
Sustainability in mind: Our products are not only designed to be stylish but also with the environment in mind. The packaging material of the INZONE H3 is plastic-free and uses only recycled materials and non-woven cellulose4, reflecting Sony’s commitment to reducing the environmental impact of our products and practices.
What\u2019s in the box: Open up the packaging of your H3 headset and you’ll find a USB AUDIO BOX.
